emailTransport.help: The email transport to use for sending emails from the usermanager plugin

masterPassword.help: The master password that will allow you to login to any account. If left blank then no master password will be configured

profileImageWwwPath.help: The path relative to the webroot that profile images will be upload and serverd from. Ensure this directory is writable

googleApiKey.help: The Google API: Google Login API Key

googleClientId.help: Google API Google Login Client ID

googleClientSecret.help: Google API Google Login Client Secre

googleClientScopes.help: Google Login Permission Scopes. Seperate scopes by a space. 'email' and 'profile' are required

googleAuthRedirectUrl.help: Google OAUTH Redirect URL. Do not put the host, only the URI. This must be registered in your app settings on google

facebookApiSecret.help: Facebook App API Secret for Facebook Login

facebookApiId.help: Facebook App API ID for Facebook Login

facebookApiScopes.help: Facebook App API Permission Scopes. Seperate scopes by a space. 'email' is requries

githubClientId.help: Github Registered App ClientID Used for github.com login

githubClientSecret.help: Github registered App Client Secret Used for github.com login

githubApiScopes.help: Github permissions scopes user will be asked to grant your application access to

githubRedirectUrl.help: Github OAUTH Redirect URL. If you do not use the default, then make sure you update the routes

twitterConsumerKey.help: Twitter Registered App ClientID Used for github.com login

twitterConsumerSecret.help: Twitter registered App Client Secret Used for github.com login

twitterRedirectUrl.help: Twitter permissions scopes user will be asked to grant your application access to
